valid_tags_format.description: Format of input.valid_tags. yaml/json are strict modes; auto explicitly tries yaml->json.

infer_tag.description: Whether to infer tags from metadata. Effective behavior is still constrained by SKILL.md defaults when metadata is missing/empty.

tag_note_language.description: Optional language intent for suggest_tags[].note (recommended BCP 47, e.g. zh-CN/en-US). This parameter must not affect other output fields or decision logic.
